Introduction

Based on Web requestAnimationFrame, using D3.js to show text, image and chart.

Help readers understand the context of the paragraph.Even though the article is very long, we still draw readers attention.

Combination parallax chart is combining area chart, line chart and bar chart. This will present complex correlations and interval changes.

When the entire article needs to be highly deconstructed, this approach can help readers understand more professional knowledge, and dismantling difficult pieces of information.
